title: Transmigrated into Another World with an Unparalleled System - Novel Updates
tags: Age Progression   Alchemy   Ancient Times   Appearance Changes   Cheats   Child Protagonist   Cultivation   Dao Comprehension   Daoism   Fantasy World   Fast Cultivation   Fast Learner   Game Elements   Immortals   Level System   Magic   Magic Beasts   Magic Formations   Magical Space   Male Protagonist   Modern Knowledge   Special Abilities   System Administrator   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong
author: Lonely Brother Zhe   Zhe Ge Hao Ji Mo   哲哥好寂寞
description:
After an otaku died and was transmigrated into the world of cultivation, he fervently struggled until he managed to join a cultivation sect. In the middle of a day’s cultivation, he unexpectedly activated a cheat — the Digitise System.

You find it hard to gain insights into cultivation? It is just like playing a game to me.

Stuck at a bottleneck? I can easily breakthrough by pummeling a few random beasts and completing a couple of missions.

Skills are too difficult to grasp? I mastered so many skills that I can’t decide which ones to use.>
